Page.name: Glyph_Mule
Page.text: When used, changes you into a mule.
Note: the process produces 40 glyphs at a time.
1 Enriched Life Essence, 1 Mixture of Power, 40 Mule Skins.

Page.name: Glyph_Phoenix
Page.text: When used, changes you into a phoenix.
Note: the process produces 3 glyphs at a time.
1 Enriched Death Essence, 1 Enriched Life Essence,

Page.name: Glyph_Mule_Info
Page.text: To become a mule you need to use a
of the glyph only lasts 30 seconds.
To stay a mule for longer you need to have
in your inventory: every 30 seconds, 1 Creature Food will
Creature Food can be made under the potion skill, or
You start as mule level 0 and every 800 Creature Food
used, your mule level increases by 1 (up to level 12).
Being in mule form gives you an increase in your EMU:
+10% at level 0 and a furhter +10% per every mule level,
up to +130% of your original EMU at level 12.
To know what mule level you are, click on yourself with
Mules can't have any item equipped, can't cast spells,
can't harvest, can't trade, can't mix and don't get
Mules can change maps, can use items (like potions and
rings), can get/drop items from/into bags, can talk to NPC
If you revert to normal form when you are carrying more
than your max EMU, you won't be able to move until you
drop enough items to go under your max load.
To change back from mule to normal, click on yourself with
Mules can be of 3 different colours, depending on the
level: grey for levels 0-3, brown for 4-7, black for

Page.name: Glyph_Phoenix_Info
Page.text: To become a phoenix you need to use a
the effect of the glyph only lasts 15 seconds.
To stay a phoenix for longer you need to have
1 Creature Food will be automatically consumed.
Creature Food can be made under the potion skill, or
You start as phoenix level 0 and after using enough
Creature Food, your phoenix level increases by 1 up to
Being in phoenix form gives you:
* +1% chance to dodge hits per phoenix level, which stacks
with the 5% default chance and with the evanescence perk
* +5% chance to 'reborn' per phoenix level, in addition to
the day of the dead effect
* if you have magic immunity cast before shapeshifting,
the spell will not wear off while in the phoenix form
* based on the phoenix level, there is a chance to not
get a cooldown when using an item.
To know what phoenix level you are, click on yourself
Phoenixes can't have any item equipped, can't cast spells,
can't harvest, can't trade and don't get fighting
Phoenixes can change maps, can use items (like potions
and rings), can get/drop items from/into bags, can talk
To change back from phoenix to normal, click on yourself
